arabic.title: إنسى
text: لا كلام هيكفي الي في قلبي ليك
ولا في معنى للدنيا الا بيك
يللي حبك هوه الي حسيت معاه
وانسى حبيبي انسى دنا لنا جايلاك ولا هناديك
اااه بحبك منا بحبك واسال قلبك هيرسيك
ااااه انسى حبيبي انسى دنا لنا جايلاك ولا هناديك
اااه بحبك منا بحبك واسال قلبك هيرسيك اااه
انت خايف قلي ولا مخبي ايه
ده انت قلبي عمري كلو بللي فيه
وانسى حبيبي انسى دنا لنا جايلاك ولا هناديك
اااه بحبك منا بحبك واسال قلبك هيرسيك
ااااه انسى حبيبي انسى دنا لنا جايلاك ولا هناديك
اااه بحبك منا بحبك واسال قلبك هيرسيك اااه
وانسى حبيبي انسى دنا لنا جايلاك ولا هناديك
اااه بحبك منا بحبك واسال قلبك هيرسيك
ااااه انسى حبيبي انسى دنا لنا جايلاك ولا هناديك
اااه بحبك منا بحبك واسال قلبك هيرسيك اااه

english.title: Enssa
text: No words could describe what I feel for you
Theres no meaning to the world without you
Your love is the one I felt
Forget, my love forget..I am not coming for you, and I wont call you
I love you, I love you, ask you heart it will assure you
Forget, my love forget..I am not coming for you, and I wont call you
I love you, I love you, ask you heart it will assure you
And you, and you, and you
Are you afraid tell me, or what are you hiding
And your my heart, my life and everything in it
My heart knows no matter what
I have been loving you for a long time
Forget, my love forget..I am not coming for you, and I wont call you
I love you, I love you, ask you heart it will assure you
Forget, my love forget..I am not coming for you, and I wont call you
I love you, I love you, ask you heart it will assure you
Forget, my love forget..I am not coming for you, and I wont call you
I love you, I love you, ask you heart it will assure you
Forget, my love forget..I am not coming for you, and I wont call you
I love you, I love you, ask you heart it will assure you

arabic.title: اسكندراني
text: آه يا واد يا اسكندراني رماني الشوق يا واد
غرقني ع الموانئ ذوبني في البعاد
ده أنا قلبي اسكندراني ... وعيوني اسكندراني
تبيعني في الليالي وتفوتني في النهار
وتقول الصبر غالي وأنا أقول البعد نار

english.title: Alexandrian
text: Oh Alexandrian one, longing wrecked me
It drowned me by the piers, It melted me in [your] distance
My heart is Alexandrian.. My eyes Alexandrian
My passion Alexandrian... and my love Alexandrian
You forsake me in the nights and abandon me in day
You say that patience is precious and I say that the distance is [like] fire
The beach is Alexandrian.. and the sea is Alexandrian
And the night is Alexandrian.. and my love is Alexandrian

arabic.title: افتكرني
text: انسي اللي كان و اللي راح
ماعدش باقي لنا كلام يا حبيبي
خطي فيها فوق عذابنا و جرحنا
حلفتني لا نخطي فوق عتب الفراق
من غير الم من غير وداع
بعت اللي كان و كانه كان

english.title: Remember me
text: remember me  whose i was one day his lover
remember me and after it i will go away and leave you
forget the torment and the wound forget what happened and what have done
just if your eyes called a memory that remember me remember me
i'm leaving you for days .. ohh my love ohh my love there's no talking between us remain ohh my love
if the yearning called you to our love way.. pass it above our torment and our wound.
Do you remember the past ? when you made me swear to you that we will not pass above steps of separation.
Do you also remember who was the betrayer and why you left me to thirty and melt the yearning.
I will not blame on you about our dreams i was your love i will just leave you for the days and it will bring you back my love.
Without tears you turned of the candles, without pain without farewell easy you left me.
You sold what was between us such as it was without price my life that i lost in your eyes.
I will not blame on you about our dreams i was your love i will just leave you for the days and it will bring you back my love.

arabic.title: السود عيونه
text: واللي رماني اللي رماني في الهوى

english.title: Those Black Eyes of Hers
text: I can't take her longing, nor her wounding
nor her fire, god forgives her
and those black eyes of hers
those black eyes of hers melted me
and confused me in the nights of her love
and when the night made me sleepless, I wondered what should I do
and I stole the star from the altitudes
and it's over my heart, it's my fate to love her eyes
and I woke up on the wound of the love, and the one who threw me
the one who threw me in the love, I'm having a ard time aking up with her
I can't take her longing, nor her wounding
nor her fire, god forgives her
that "3ennab" of her cheeks, is sugary (3ennab is a crimson drink)
I'm so close to buy some from them
that "3ennab oh her cheeks is so sweet
I came close to it, but it didn't let me drink any
so I walked away from her, then she called me, and I went back to her
I'm so in love that I'm sad
and that cutie is very likable
and I was thirsty once again when she came back, opening her arms
and I woke up on the wound of the love, and the one who threw me
the one who threw me in the love, I'm having a ard time aking up with her
I can't take her longing, nor her wounding
nor her fire, god forgives her
and those black eyes of hers
those black eyes of hers melted me
and confused me in the nights of her love
and when the night made me sleepless, I wondered what should I do
and I stole the star from the altitudes
those black eyes of hers melted me
and confused me in the nights of her love
that "3ennab oh her cheeks is so sweet
I came close to it, but it didn't let me drink any
those black eyes of hers melted me
and confused me in the nights of her love
and I stole the star from the altitudes
those black eyes of hers melted me
and confused me in the nights of her love
that "3ennab oh her cheeks is so sweet
I came close to it, but it didn't let me drink any

english.title: blacke eyes
text: can't handel her love or her pain or her fire
her black eyes her black eyes
and her love mad me tired
and the nights kept me up what can i do
i will give her everything expensive i even steal the stars from the sky
that's it she is wirtten for me what can i do
iwoke up with the pain air
and what throw me to love air
can't handel her love or her pain or her fire
her cheeks are like grabes if i come closer i have to buy
if i come closer to her will she give me to drink
i left her and she called me and i came bake why why
iam diying for her eyes and this beautiful women is draving me carzy
her black eyes her black eyes
and her love mad me tired
and the nights kept me up what can i do

arabic.title: الليلة دوب
text: ا تا تا تا تا تا
ولافيش قلوب تجرح قلوب الليلة دية

english.title: El Leila Doob
text: (this has no meaning consider it like ad libs and sound effects)
Tonight is great and we must accept what was destined to be this night, tonight is great and there are no hearts to scar other hearts on this night
I closed my eyes (oh baby) and dreamt of you and I woke and here I am (oh baby) with my hands in yours
And I swore, oh passion, from her I will not repent
And tonight tonight is for the lovers, no fire no confusion and no longing, tonight tonight is for the lovers, come close to me darling
And tonight tonight is for the lovers, no fire no confusion and no longing, and from this night forth my heart will not spend a night alone
And tonight tonight is promised for us and come oh happiness for us, and sadness get out of here, you don't belong, that's it I've found my baby
And tonight tonight is promised for us and come oh happiness for us, and I won't waste a night of our lives without the love of my baby

english.title: Ba7ebek
text: Oh, the soul of my heart
Your door is closed, but I'm still worried about you
Oh, the one who passed me by
Make me stay awake at nights
I am waiting for your eyes
And i am in your hands
I miss you and i love you, say it to me
Oh, the soul of my heart
Your door is closed, but I'm still worried about you
Oh, the one who passed me by
The love with its happiness and its sigh
And your love in my embrace
We'll say: Oh love candles, lighten

arabic.title: بسلم عليك
text: دا إنت اللي كان حضنك زمان بيضمني
و لو مش جاي أجيلك فين
و مش هرتاح غير و أنا وياك
و لا إنت مش عايز تشوفني خلاص بقى

english.title: I send my greetings to you
text: I send my greetings to you
Because I suddenly felt that I miss you
I send my greetings to you
You're the one who used to take me in her arms
It's too hard to hide a feeling
That lived inside me for years
I wish to be with you, my love
If you aren't coming, where can I find you?
Day and night, I'll wait you
My heart is in pain and it's like being in heaven with you
I will never rest unless I am with you
I send my greetings to you
You've been absent and my soul is still longing for you
Don't you want to see me anymore?

english.title: Be3edna w Gheletna
text: after us and our fault.. and our fault is the price for years...
look where we are .... and where our wounds are and .........
my darling, inside of me is something .. i can't .......
and all the life story is passing ..... i wish it come back
I told you ... that me without you and in you.
its easy to live without your eyes

arabic.title: بنظره عين
text: بنظرة عين نسيت انا مين وخدنى حنين
لااقيت وياك فى عينى الدنيا حاجه تانيه
فى قلبى غرام ولا فى الاحلام
لااقيت وياك فى عينى الدنيا حاجه تانية

english.title: Benazret 3ein
text: With the look of an eye, I forgot who I am
Her tenderness has taken me and now I can't sleep at night
Your love has worked me and made me fall into you
I saw in you, my world is something else
Every second I think of you
My darling, no matter how hard I try I will not live, but for you
I swear, your love is important to me
And the days that are coming, what are they worth without your eyes?
And I will only be yours
Promise me that you will never leave me
In my heart there is passion you won't even find in your dreams
Years and days I have patiently waited
Every second I think of you
My darling, no matter how hard I try I will not live, but for you
I swear, your love is important to me
And the days that are coming, what are they worth without your eyes?
With the look of an eye, with the look of an eye
Your love has worked me and made me fall into you
I saw in you, my world is something else
Every second I think of you
My darling, no matter how hard I try I will not live, but for you
I swear, your love is important to me
And the days that are coming, what are they worth without your eyes?

arabic.title: حبك نار
text: مهما تكون أيامك برد وحبك نار جمد قلبك حفضل أحبك
مهما جناحك يتعب من طول المشوار جمد قلبك حفضل أحبك
ما أنا من يوم ماعرفت الحب وحبك نار
أحلام عمرنا لو من قلبنا هتعيش ونعيش ده الحلم من حقنا
لو هان حلمنا لو هان حبنا لاصديق ولاشيء في الكون هيفضلنا
مد ايديك في ايدية وبكرة الصعب يهون جمد قلبك حفضل أحبك
اوعى تخون الحب وتكره مهما يكون جمد قلبك حفضل أحبك
ما أنا من يوم ماعرفت الحب وحبك نار
أحلام عمرنا لو من قلبنا هتعيش ونعيش ده الحلم من حقنا
لو هان حلمنا لو هان حبنا لاصديق ولاشيء في الكون هيفضلنا
أحلام عمرنا لو من قلبنا هتعيش ونعيش ده الحلم من حقنا
لو هان حلمنا لو هان حبنا لاصديق ولاشيء في الكون هيفضلنا
أحلام عمرنا لو من قلبنا هتعيش ونعيش ده الحلم من حقنا
لو هان حلمنا لو هان حبنا لاصديق ولاشيء في الكون هيفضلنا
أحلام عمرنا لو من قلبنا هتعيش ونعيش ده الحلم من حقنا
لو هان حلمنا لو هان حبنا لاصديق ولاشيء في الكون هيفضلنا

english.title: No matter
text: No matter how cold your days are, your love is fire
No matter how tired your wings are from the long journey
mana men youm ma 3ereft el 7ob we 7obak nar
If they are from our heart
They will live and we will too
The world would still be there
Reach out for my hand, and in the future everything will be easier
Don't betray love and never hate no matter what

english.title: Your love is Fire
text: mahma tekoon ayamak bard we 7obak nar
mahma gena7ak yet3ab men tool el meshwar
From the day I knew what love is, your love was fire
med edeek le edaya we bokra el sa3b yehoon
ew3a te7'oon el 7ob we tekrah mahma yekoon

arabic.title: حبيب حياتى
text: معاك انا انا انا بسهر وبدارى

english.title: Love of My Life
text: oh love of my life, my life is with you
I, I, I am sleepless and I hide it
I, I, I am on fire
oh love of my life, my life is with you
if you love me like that
then how come you make me think about you and then you foget me?
you who make me live torture in your love
and who melted my heart with you
my love I won't forget you
I won't forget you, I won't forget you
oh love of my life, my life is with you
I, I, I am sleepless and I hide it
I, I, I am on fire
oh love of my life, my life is with you
if you love me like that
then how come you make me think about you and then you foget me?
why have you never huged me, not even once?
you who leave me each time and yet you say you love me
and yet you say you love me, and yet you say you love me
you who make me live torture in your love
and who melted my heart with you
my love I won't forget you
I won't forget you, I won't forget you
oh love of my life, my life is with you

then how come you make me think about you and then you foget me?
why, you who forgot me, your love is like that?
you hurt me then you comfort me but it doesn't show on you
but it doesn't show on you, but it doesn't show on you
you who make me live torture in your love
and who melted my heart with you
my love I won't forget you
I won't forget you, I won't forget you
oh love of my life, my life is with you

I, I, I am on fire
oh love of my life, my life is with you

you who make me live torture in your love
and who melted my heart with you

I won't forget you, I won't forget you

english.title: The Lovers' Path
text: I once had an embrace to hold me and a home
for you to embrace me and my darling
The most precious of lovers is you, my darling
If you are still melting in the flames of my love
Come back and take me, take me
we'd sing: oh night, oh moon
And reach the moon with our hands
Come back and take me, take me
I beseech you, make me understand
take my pain away and give me
to the one who is my love, my soul and my eyes
So that we can melt in a
Come back and take me, take me
My heart is full of longing

arabic.title: طال الليل
text: طال الليل والشوق مواويل اه يا ليل يا ليلى ليل يا ليلى
طال الليل والعشق جميل اه يا ليل يا ليلى ليل يا ليلى
طال الليل والليل ياما دوبنا فية حلو الحب تعالى نعيش لياليه
طال الليل وحرام شوقنا نداريه قوم يا حبيبى تعالى نسلم ليه
ونقول ياسنين هانعيش عاشقين واحلى كلام فى الحب نذوق معانيه
ونقول ياسنين ماحناش خايفين حلو الحب تعالى نعيش لياليه
ياحبيبى خذنى معاك خذنى لجنة شوق وياك
ياحبيبي احلف بهواك عمرى ما هانسي الليل وانساك
حلوة ليالى الغرام ياقلبى وحلوة ياناس غنوية
عدى ليالي الفراق ياقلبى وليل الغنى خليه
ونقول ياسنين ماحناش خايفين حلو الحب تعالى نعيش لياليه
يللا يا عمري نعيش لقانا عمر بكل مافيه
على غناوينا ينام هوانا وقلوبنا تصحيه
ونقول ياسنين ماحناش خايفين حلو الحب تعالى نعيش لياليه

english.title: The Night became Long
text: the night became long and longing is hard
the night became long and passion is great
the night became long, and we've spent long nights loving each other
love is sweet, let's live its nights
the night became long, and it's bad to hide ours
let's give ourselves to it my love
and we say, we'll live in love
and we'll taste the meaning of the sweetest love words
and we say, we're not scared
love is sweet, let's live it
my darling, take me with you
take me to a paradise of love with you
my darling, i swear with your love
I'll never forget the nights or forget you
the night became long and longing is hard
the night became long and passion is great
nights of deep love are sweet
and its songs are sweet too
let the nights of separation pass
and let the nights of singing stay
and we say, we're not scared
love is sweet, let's live it
my darling, take me with you
take me to a paradise of love with you
my darling, i swear with your love
I'll never forget the nights or forget you
the night became long and longing is hard
the night became long and passion is great
come on my life, let's live our togetherness
a life with all it has
our love will sleep to our songs
and then our hearts would wake it
and we say, we're not scared
love is sweet, let's live it
my darling, take me with you
my darling, i swear with your love
I'll never forget the nights or forget you
the night became long, and we've spent long nights loving each other
love is sweet, let's live its nights
the night became long, and it's bad to hide ours
let's give ourselves to it my love
and we say, we'll live in love
and we'll taste the meaning of the sweetest love words
and we say, we're not scared
love is sweet, let's live it

arabic.title: عارف ليه
text: انا لو عايز اعيش في الجنة

english.title: And Why Am I?
text: and why am I only thnking about her eyes?
dreaming about her her eyes and calling her?
and I only think about her?
I swear, I don't know when or how
her eyes took me away, and she made me think about her
and why am I only thnking about her eyes?
dreaming about her her eyes and calling her?
and I only think about her?
I love her from the bottom of my heart, the one the took my heart
and I wish all my life, she'd be next to me
I swear, I don't know when or how
her eyes took me away, and she made me think about her
and why am I only thnking about her eyes?
dreaming about her her eyes and calling her?
and I only think about her?
I loved her from a whisper, I melted from a touch
I was lost with her love
I'll live my days for her, and all my dreams
I swear, I don't know when or how
her eyes took me away, and she made me think about her

arabic.title: قلب جريء
text: طول ما احنا ايدين ماسكة التانية

english.title: A Brave Heart
text: if your heart was a brave heart
then you've chosen love as a path
open your heart, yes I love you
my heart needs a friend too
let your heart dream till the end
let you longing take you and travel
the dream is a road with no end
and love is hands pulling a drowning person
if your heart was a brave heart
then you've chosen love as a path
open your heart, yes I love you
my heart needs a friend too
don't leave your destiny up to the world
and don't you ever be sad for even a second
as long as our hands are holding each other
we'll live it with a laugh of an innocent child
if your heart was a brave heart
then you've chosen love as a path
open your heart, you who I love
my heart needs a friend too
if your heart was a brave heart
then you've chosen love as a path
open your heart, yes I love you
my heart needs a friend too

arabic.title: كدابة
text: ده انا ياما نديته يا قلبى

english.title: A LIE
text: the one i love why is she going away , how many time did i call her how many time i asked about her (x2)
why did she forget me when my heart is with her . i lost my years with her .her air got me lost (x2)
her black eyes are lying ,her black eyes are lying ,her black eyes are lying
the one i love whe is she going away , how many time did i call her how many time i asked about her (x2)
beacues i love her she left me and made my heart worry about her
.she mad me wite for her thinking
why did she forget me when my heart is with her . i lost my years with her .her
her black eyes are lying ,her black eyes are lying ,her black eyes are lying
the one i love why is she going away , how many time did i call her how many time i asked about her (x2)

english.title: The words of your eyes
text: The words in your eyes have confused me, night and day I cannot sleep
Sometimes I think that as time passes by you will leave me
I fear the day will come that you leave and I stay behind
All alone, living in pain, and all my dreams disappear in a second
And how can my heart feel comfort if your love..
Leaves, tell me who else will be my love
Sometimes I feel tired and call you to hold me
With the touch of your hands I forget all what im in
And if you leave I cant live

english.title: We're Still Lovers
text: Are we going to say we are lovers ? ..We've already said that
Are we going to say our hearts are melted? .. We've already said that
Are we going to say we are lovers ? ..We've already said that
Are we going to say our hearts are melted? .. We've already said that
Our love is the best thing, my love come lets live
I have words inside of me that wont be enough
Are we going to say we are lovers ? ..We've already said that
Are we going to say our hearts are melted? .. We've already said that
Are we going to say we are lovers ? ..We've already said that
Are we going to say our hearts are melted? .. We've already said that
Our love is the best thing, my love come lets live
I have words inside of me that wont be enough
Are we going to say we are lovers ? ..We've already said that
We will say everything tonight...We've already said that
We will say we lived a beautiful life...We've already said that
We will say everything tonight...We've already said that
We will say we lived a beautiful life...We've already said that
You stole my heart with a look,
My love be closer to me, I wish to live my days

arabic.title: ما بحبكيش
text: وانا انا انا انااا بنساا لي
انا بنسا ليه انا بنسا ليه الدندنه

WHAT WAS BETWEEN US..IS ONLY A PIECES OF PAPER..COLD FEELING FULLED ME WHEN U WENT AWAY.
BUT WHY.. IM SO SAD...DREAMING GETTING UR HEAVEN BACK.
YEARS PASSING BY AND I CANT HEAR ANYTHING BESIDE UR WHISPEARS.

arabic.title: ما بلاش
text: لا لا لأ، لا لا لأ ما بلاش
أصل انتي جمالك ده ما خلاش
ويا حلو أنا مين غيرك ليا؟

english.title: Don't/Stop It/Let's Not/...
text: hey beautiful tell me, and don't make
your heart always go away, and like me
no no no, no no no don't
or else the flowers would get jealous
don't increase the charm of the eyes
the flowers on the cheeks are enough
it's because your beauty hasn't left anything
no no no, no no no don't
or else the flowers would get jealous
don't let your eyes confuse me
and enough that your love has changed me
my heart in you awayness is worthless
no no no, no no no don't
or else the flowers would get jealous
an sweety, who else do I have?
I've felt the kindness with you
my heart in you awayness is worthless
no no no, no no no don't
or else the flowers would get jealous
don't increase the charm of the eyes
the flowers on the cheeks are enough
it's because your beauty hasn't left anything
no no no, no no no don't
or else the flowers would get jealous

arabic.title: من اول يوم
text: دا انا قلبي و الله والله بيناديك
بيقولي عليك اجمل غنوه اجمل غنوه
صعب اني عيش من غير عنيك

english.title: From The First Day
text: from the first day I knew you, and I wanted to confess to you
that you are my only love
and I found my love in yours, my life dreems and my childhood
take my heart, my soul, my life, it's all for you
take my longing, my love, my eyes are calling you
and just give me one look from your eyes
I swear my heart it calling you
you heart and your eyes, say
my heart that wants you, is telling me about you
stay with me, my hand in yours
it's hard for me to live without your eyes
take my heart, my soul, my life, it's all for you
take my longing, my love, my eyes are calling you
and just give me one look from your eyes
I swear my heart it calling you
I dream with you, and draw dreams
and your love takes me, and I find myself
stay with me, my hand in yours
it's hard for me to live without your eyes
take my heart, my soul, my life, it's all for you
take my longing, my love, my eyes are calling you
and just give me one look from your eyes
I swear my heart it calling you
from the first day I knew you, and I wanted to confess to you
that you are my only love

arabic.title: منايا
text: و ياريتك تعرف ايه جوايا .. جوايا
ايام وسنين بتفوت عمري يجري مني
وتعيش احلام و تموت و انتا جوا مني
حبيبي انا بحلم تبقى معايا .. معايا
من نار البعد تعبت كفاية .. كفاية
ايام وسنين بتفوت عمري يجري مني
وتعيش احلام و تموت و انتا جوا مني
و لا قلبك حاسس باللي جرالي .. جرالي
ايام وسنين بتفوت عمري يجري مني
وتعيش احلام و تموت و انتا جوا مني
ايام وسنين بتفوت عمري يجري مني
وتعيش احلام و تموت و انتا جوا مني
و يا ريتك تعرف ايه جوايا .. جوايا
ايام وسنين بتفوت عمري يجري مني
وتعيش احلام و تموت و انتا جوا مني

english.title: My Wish
text: my wish my darling is for you to feel my love (my love)
and I wish you'd know what's in me (in me) (in me is an expression for "my feelings")
day and years pass (my life escapes from me)
and dreams live and die (while you're inside me) (inside my heart)
my darling I dream you'd be with me (with me)
I'm sick of the flames of separation, enough (enough)
day and years pass (my life escapes from me)
and dreams live and die (while you're inside me) (inside my heart)
for nights you've left me alone (nights)
but your heart doesn't feel what happend to me (happend to me)
day and years pass (my life escapes from me)
and dreams live and die (while you're inside me) (inside my heart)
my wish my darling is for you to feel my love (my love)
and I wish you'd know what's in me (in me) (in me is an expression for "my feelings")
day and years pass (my life escapes from me)
and dreams live and die (while you're inside me) (inside my heart)

english.title: Monaya
text: My wish, my darling, is that you feel my love
If only you knew what was inside of me
My life runs away from me
My darling I am dreaming to be with you
I've become exhausted from the fire of separation
My life runs away from me
And my heart doesn't feel what's happened to me
My life runs away from me
My wish, my darling, is that you feel my love
If only you knew what was inside of me
My life runs away from me

arabic.title: مين غيرك
text: مين غيرك مين غيرك مين غيرك؟
اه ليلي ليل ليلي يا عين
اه ليلي ليل ليلي يا عين
لا يا حبيبي لا حقدر في يوم انساك
ده انا قلبي اللي حبك وداب في هواك

english.title: Who Else But You?
text: yes my love I love you, why do you ask?
then who's in my heart and I dream about?
don't I dream about youmy heart?
who else but you is on my mind?
who else but you would have mercy on me
and your eyes are asking what's with me?
oh my night, oh my eye*
I've fallen for you in a second
oh my night, oh my eye*
your love is worth the whole world
no my love I'd never be able to forget you
and I'd never leave you someday
my heart that loved you and melted in your love
will live your lover, and will die your lover
who else but you is on my mind?
who else but you would have mercy on me
and your eyes are asking what's with me?
oh my night, oh my eye*
I've fallen for you in a second
oh my night, oh my eye*
your love is worth the whole world

arabic.title: واہ یا غزالی
text: واه يا غزالي واه يا غزالي
واه يا غزالي واه يا غزالي
لو الهوى ينباع كنت اروح واودي
لو الهوى بيّاع قلبه يدوب في ودي
واه يا غزالي يا تاعب لي حالي
واه يا غزالي يا ابو قلب خالي
بيّاع خدّاع وملكش حبيب ولا غالي
واه يا غزالي يا تاعب لي حالي
يا شاغل لي بالي يا ابو الهوى لوّاع
لو الهوى ينباع كنت اروح واودي
لو الهوى بيّاع قلبه يدوب في ودي
بيّاع خدّاع ولا عدى حدانا يا عيني
مجروح داويني يا ابو الهوى لوّاع
لو الهوى ينباع كنت اروح واودي
لو الهوى بيّاع قلبه يدوب في ودي
واه يا غزالي يا تاعب لي حالي
واه يا غزالي يا ابو قلب خالي
بيّاع خدّاع وملكش حبيب ولا غالي
واه يا غزالي يا تاعب لي حالي
يا شاغل لي بالي يا ابو الهوى لوّاع

english.title: oh my deer
text: if love was for sale, I'd go and bring you some
if love was a merchant, her heart would fall for me
oh my deer, oh my deer
oh my deer, oh my deer
you're a teaser, who only causes misery
careless, deciever, who has no loved ones or precious ones
oh my deer, you who exhausts me
you who's on my mind, you with the teasing love
if love was for sale, I'd go and bring you some
if love was a merchant, her heart would fall for me
oh you who forgot me, oh you who forgot me
oh you who forgot me, oh you who forgot me
when will you come to me

careless, deciever, who has no loved ones or precious ones
oh you who forgot me, when will you come to me

arabic.title: يا مجنونة
text: عشان خاطرك انا راضي عن الحاضر عن الماضي
واشوف بكره اشوف بكره بيضحك ليه وبحلم بيه في احضاني
ولو كنتي ولو كنتي ولوكنتي جرحتيني

english.title: Ya Magnona
text: i love you to death oh crazy
i love you to death oh crazy
and the love is sweet in your madness
and i challenge who blamed us
and fight them all for you
i love you to death oh crazy
i love you to death oh crazy
and the love is sweet in your madness
and i challenge who blamed us
and fight them all for you
for your sake i'm satisfied about the present and the past
and i see tomorrow smiling at me and i dream of it in my arms
i love you to death oh crazy
i love you to death oh crazy
and the love is sweet in your madness
and i challenge who blamed us
and fight them all for you
and i don't know what's allowed
and i don't know what's allowed
but my heart is an opened book
wants to tell his sad stories
i love you to death oh crazy
i love you to death oh crazy
and the love is sweet in your madness
and i challenge who blamed us
and fight them all for you
i've been staraight to you so you be
i forgave you so forgive me
my soul and tenderness are in your blood
